title: Florian Lecorvaisier’s website
text: Welcome to my poorly done website! I use it mostly to develop my skills in Quarto, Git, HTML and CSS, as well as to post some stuff I may find interesting.

title: Curriculum vitæ
text: Eco-epidemiology researcher with a particular interest in the evolution of infectious diseases.

title: Curriculum vitæ
text:
Work history
   PhD Student

   10/2021 - 09/2024              LBBE, Villeurbanne, France
Working on the evolution of diphtheria and pertussis under vaccine pressure by the mean of mathematical modeling, numerical simulations and statistical analyzes.

 
   Master degree internship

   01/2021 - 06/2021              LBBE, Villeurbanne, France
Developing a SIR-like model to study how toxoid vaccines could select for toxin-deficient strains.

 
   Bachelor degree internship

   06/2019                        LEHNA, Villeurbanne, France
Developing a database of amphibian dispersal distances and morphological traits.

   Lecorvaisier F.

   Using a dynamical model to study the impact of a toxoid vaccine on the evolution of a bacterium: The example of diphtheria

   Lecorvaisier F., Pontier D., Soubeyrand B. and Fouchet D.
   2024                       Ecological Modelling, vol. 487, pp. 110569
